result.reason: Feature request to auto-configure SSH public key authentication (e.g., auto-discover ~/.ssh/id_rsa or negotiate pubkey method), enhancing usability for SSH1/SSH2/OpenSSH connections.
result.approach: Add auto-discovery logic in OpenSSH and PuttyBase protocols to scan default key locations (~/.ssh/id_rsa, id_ed25519) when PrivateKeyPath is empty; optionally add an AuthenticationMethod enum (Password/PublicKey/Auto) to AbstractConnectionRecord to let users opt into automatic pubkey negotiation.
